author: zcstarr
content:
ðŸ‘‹ Hey Zane here from Open-RPC helping with error standardization in conjunction <@809723543923064845>  from Chainlink on Error codes. 

<@809723543923064845> is looking for feedback on standardizing the error codes he has an issue in the execution-apis repo  to comment on as well as a couple PRs up. 

Execution-APIs issue:
https://github.com/ethereum/execution-apis/issues/658


Standardized Code Proposal:
https://github.com/user-attachments/files/20363196/ENG-ERC_.Standardized.JSON-RPC.Error.Codes.and.Messages-210525-082426.pdf
PR for execution Apis:
https://github.com/ethereum/execution-apis/pull/650
PR for rpctestgen:
https://github.com/lightclient/rpctestgen/pull/42

OpenRPC
https://open-rpc.org
OpenRPC Error groups Extension
https://github.com/open-rpc/tools/tree/main/packages/extensions/src/x-error-groups
OpenRPC - New Repo
https://github.com/open-rpc/tools
OpenRPC- Generator
https://github.com/open-rpc/generator

author: robocopsgonemad
content: huge! thanks for showing up here

author: smimz
content: Thank you Zane, Would really appreciate some feedback from Clients on this. We have already done some Prototyping & validations, just need to settle on the error codes grouping based on feedback, this is going to help the community massively

author: zcstarr
content:
Hey <@827653956955406406> that was a nice PR for the docusaurus, but actually we don't recommend you use that plugin, but instead bump to the generator 2.x.x which should be able to be run locally or you can attempt to migrate the one from metamask, it's not in great shape, and we don't have access to update it to make into good shape. It was in better shape than the generator one , but is now behind the new 2.x.x version which is still gatsby but modern deps up and down. 

If you stay on the open-rpc/generator package we'll be able to maintain it and add updates especially since the mono repo overhaul we did and ecosystem update.
